channel.title: adobe reader on dronesec
channel.description: Recent content in adobe reader on dronesec

item.title: Digging the Adobe Sandbox - IPC Internals
item.description: This post kicks off a short series into reversing the Adobe Reader sandbox. I initially started this research early last year and have been working on it off and on since. This series will document the Reader sandbox internals, present a few tools for reversing/interacting with it, and a description of the results of this research. There may be quite a bit of content here, but I’ll be doing a lot of braindumping.
